channel.title: Ashish Jain Portfolio on Ashish Jain
channel.description: Recent content in Ashish Jain Portfolio on Ashish Jain

item.title: Internship: Dukaan
item.description: Analyzing product details and images to categorize them for different online stores. Created a machine learning model to classify and organize product images.

item.title: Internship: Reomnify
item.description: Collected HTML and API data from scraping websites and then storing them in relational SQL Database. Interacting with company founders, technology lead and colleagues on a daily basis.

item.title: Project 1: Live Chess Game with AI Engine
item.description: A complete and functional Chess Game created out of passion for the game. The game is entirely created using Python Language and runs on a server. A player can play against another player or against a chess AI Engine with variable difficulties. Moves are displayed in correct order beside the chess window. At any moment during the game, moves can be undone and redone cleanly and efficiently. The AI algorithm used allows the game to find the best move in a given position.

item.title: Project 2: Data Analysis and Forecasting of 'Covid-19' Data
item.description: Real excerpt from the code I created to analyze the data I enrolled in an Edtech Company known as SmartKnower to learn Data Science from basics to advanced level using Python language. During my training I learned about Python Data Structures, Design Patterns, and Object Oriented Programming concepts. I also learned about various libraries in the Python language used for different tasks, such as the “numpy” library for computing numerical data quickly and efficiently, “pandas” library to maintain, manage, and draw insights from Datasets.
